metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15890 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low.
metadata.Description:
libslirp 4.0.0, as used in QEMU 4.1.0, has a use-after-free in ip_reass in ip_input.c. It was discovered that a use-after-free vulnerability existed in the SLiRP networking implementation of QEMU. A local attacker in a guest could use this to cause a denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15890` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libslirp0 - 4.1.0-2
No subscription required

qemu - 1:4.2-1ubuntu1
qemu-block-extra - 1:4.2-1ubuntu1
qemu-guest-agent - 1:4.2-1ubuntu1
qemu-kvm - 1:4.2-1ubuntu1
qemu-system - 1:4.2-1ubuntu1
qemu-system-arm - 1:4.2-1ubuntu1
qemu-system-common - 1:4.2-1ubuntu1
qemu-system-data - 1:4.2-1ubuntu1
qemu-system-gui - 1:4.2-1ubuntu1
qemu-system-mips - 1:4.2-1ubuntu1
qemu-system-misc - 1:4.2-1ubuntu1
qemu-system-ppc - 1:4.2-1ubuntu1
qemu-system-s390x - 1:4.2-1ubuntu1
qemu-system-sparc - 1:4.2-1ubuntu1
qemu-system-x86 - 1:4.2-1ubuntu1
qemu-system-x86-xen - 1:4.2-1ubuntu1
qemu-user - 1:4.2-1ubuntu1
qemu-user-binfmt - 1:4.2-1ubuntu1
qemu-user-static - 1:4.2-1ubuntu1
qemu-utils - 1:4.2-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

slirp4netns - 0.4.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: basilisk2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
bochs package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
fs-uae package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
libslirp package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.0-2').
ns3 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
qemu package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:4.2-1ubuntu1').
slirp package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
slirp4netns package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.4.1-1').
vde2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
virtualbox package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
virtualbox-hwe package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
